title: Jasper the Bold
description: Jasper Jenkins is a boy who is brave and not afraid of anything! Or is he? This humorous tale, written in rhyme, takes you through the mind of a young child who believes that he is courageous despite all the silly, strange, and even downright outrageous things he fears. It helps to teach children that people can be afraid of anything and that it is okay. This story brings to life the reality of fears and makes the reader laugh along the way.
author: Krystal Fernandes
